page.title: 26Updated prices at a Supermaket in Tadcaster
page.content:
1kg potatoes £1.00

1kg sugar £1.66

1.5kg flour £1.30

1.5kg salt £0.89

800gm loaf £1.30

500gm Tea bags £3.99

100gm coffee £1.07

415gm tinned fruit £0.67

568ml milk £0.55

250gm butter £1.50

454gm beef £7.00

454gm lamb chops£6.30

454gm cod £4.86

1doz eggs £2.07

4.5l petrol £6.30

4 bed det house £292,000

3 bed semi det. £175,000

2/3 bed terrace £119,000

Some prices were averaged. Supermarket "offers" not included!
Contribution by: Peter Bradshaw
